title: React JS - AdvPOS
description: The objective of this app is to help users manage their expenses, bills and cash flows, to easily analyze their data based on the comparison of both. I envision this project to benefit community, by creating planner reports for their finance management.

title: FastAPI - API Backend for AdvPOS
description: This an API service and serves as a backend for my personal project, a React App website AdvPOS. This includes user Authentication and Mongodb database CRUD operations.

title: Power BI - Real Estate Dashboard of London Sold Properties
description: This project has helpful insights of sold properties in London to assist Market Research or Analysis. I also want to emphasize here my ability to incorporate and show GeoJSON data or Geographic data in Power BI.

title: Microsoft Excel - CRM of L&M's Products (My Computer Parts Small Business)
description: The objective of this App is to be able to assist my personal business here in the Philippines, in Inventory management, Revenue projection and Cost analysis.

title: Microsoft Excel - Dashboard of L&M's Products
description: This helps me in identifying potential improvements to my inventory management that can also contribute to addition and reduction of marketing spend that most businesses can benefit from.
